sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; const SchoolRules = () => { const attendanceRules = [ "Regular attendance is mandatory for all students", "Students must arrive at school before the first bell", "Late arrival requires permission from the Principal", "Minimum 75% attendance is required for promotion", "Medical leave requires doctor's certificate", "Leave applications must be submitted in advance", "Absence without prior notice is not acceptable", "Parents must inform school about extended absence" ]; const uniformRules = [ "Complete school uniform must be worn at all times", "Uniform should be clean, pressed, and in good condition", "Proper shoes and socks as per school standards", "Hair should be neat and properly groomed", "No jewelry except small earrings for girls", "Nails should be clean and trimmed", "School bag should be plain and simple", "Winter uniform should be navy blue" ]; const behaviorRules = [ "Respect teachers, staff, and fellow students", "Maintain discipline and decorum at all times", "No use of mobile phones or electronic devices", "No eating or drinking in classrooms", "Keep school premises clean and tidy", "Follow instructions immediately and respectfully", "No fighting, bullying, or harassment", "Report any problems to teachers or staff" ]; const academicRules = [ "Complete all homework and assignments on time", "Bring required books and materials daily", "Participate actively in classroom activities", "Maintain notebooks and study materials properly", "Follow examination rules and regulations", "Seek help from teachers when needed", "Use library and laboratory facilities responsibly", "Maintain academic integrity and honesty" ]; const safetyRules = [ "Follow safety instructions in laboratories", "Use playground equipment safely and responsibly", "Report any accidents or injuries immediately", "No running in corridors or staircases", "Keep emergency exits clear and accessible", "Follow fire drill procedures when instructed", "No bringing of dangerous or harmful objects", "Maintain personal safety and security awareness" ]; return (

School Rules

General rules and regulations governing school life and activities at Genesis School

{/* Attendance Rules */}

Attendance Rules

 {attendanceRules.map((rule, index) => ( ⏰ {rule} ))} {/* Uniform and Behavior Rules */}

Uniform Rules

 {uniformRules.map((rule, index) => ( 👔 {rule} ))}

Behavior Rules

 {behaviorRules.map((rule, index) => ( 🤝 {rule} ))} {/* Academic and Safety Rules */}

Academic Rules

 {academicRules.map((rule, index) => ( 📚 {rule} ))}

Safety Rules

 {safetyRules.map((rule, index) => ( 🛡️ {rule} ))} {/* School Values */}

School Values & Principles
Respect

We value respect for self, others, and the environment. Students are expected to treat everyone with dignity and kindness.

Integrity

We promote honesty, truthfulness, and moral uprightness. Students are encouraged to do what is right even when no one is watching.

Excellence

We strive for excellence in all endeavors. Students are encouraged to give their best effort in academics and activities.

{/* Consequences and Rewards */}

Consequences & Rewards
Consequences for Rule Violations
  • Verbal warning for minor infractions
  • Written warning for repeated offenses
  • Parent notification for serious violations
  • Detention or community service
  • Suspension for major violations
  • Expulsion for severe offenses
Rewards for Good Behavior
  • Recognition in school assembly
  • Good conduct certificates
  • Student of the month awards
  • Leadership opportunities
  • Special privileges and responsibilities
  • Participation in special events
 {/* Contact Information */}

Rule Inquiries

For questions about school rules or to report violations:

Principal Office

7895236185

Vice Principal

7895236186

Email

rules@genesisschool.com

Office Hours

8:00 AM - 4:00 PM

 ); }; export default SchoolRules;
